#Code generation testcase
_main[]
	int a, b, c,d ;
	int result;
	a = 10;
	b = 20;
	c = 30;
	string s;
	s = "hello";
	if ((a<15).and.(b<=c))
		print(a);
		print(b);
		print(c);
		a = @s;
		result = (a+b)-(10+c-8+2-a);
		print(result);
		d = result + a*2; 
		print(d);
	else 
		d = 0;
	endif;
	print(d);
end
# Your code generator must generate the equivalent code in file code.asm using the ISA of NASM simulator.
# Execute the file code.asm in NASM and obtain resultant value as 26 
# If you get 0 or any other value of d, check the jump statements generated by your compiler.
